segments.text: Would you care to join for the picnic tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Much to my regret , I'll have to meet my girlfriend at the airport then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'd like to invite you for our dress party tomorrow evening , are you free ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Much as we'd like to , but we've booked up already for that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity ! You can't join us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So sorry . Next time we'll go , thanks anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
